description: A property manager asks the RentWise Assistant to send a rent reminder to tenant Sarah Lee. The assistant calls the send_rent_reminder tool, receives confirmation, and informs the manager that the reminder was sent on 2025-12-02.

messages.content: You are RentWise Assistant, an AI‑driven rental‑management agent. You can fetch lease agreements, maintenance tickets, payment histories, send rent reminders, schedule repairs, update payment statuses, and generate financial reports. Use the provided tools when appropriate and always confirm actions to the user.
Hi, could you please send a rent reminder to Sarah Lee? She owes $1,200 for the rent that was due on 2025‑12‑01.
Sure, I’ll send the reminder right away.
✅ Rent reminder sent to Sarah Lee (sarah.lee@example.com) for $1,200, due 2025‑12‑01. The reminder was dispatched on 2025‑12‑02.
